name: Lead Scoring
description: Score and qualify leads based on firmographic fit and behavioral intent to prioritize sales efforts and optimize marketing-to-sales handoff.
author: Dagster Community

inputs.description: Connect lead data, behavioral data, or company data

outputs.description: Lead scores with MQL/SQL qualification and temperature classification

asset_name.label: Asset Name
asset_name.description: Name of the lead scoring output asset

lead_data_asset.label: Lead Data Asset
lead_data_asset.description: Lead/contact data from CRM (automatically set via lineage)

fit_weight.label: Fit Weight
fit_weight.description: Weight for fit score in combined model (0-1)

intent_weight.label: Intent Weight
intent_weight.description: Weight for intent score in combined model (0-1)

company_size_weight.label: Company Size Weight
company_size_weight.description: Weight for company size in fit score

industry_weight.label: Industry Weight
industry_weight.description: Weight for industry match in fit score

job_title_weight.label: Job Title Weight
job_title_weight.description: Weight for job title relevance in fit score

geography_weight.label: Geography Weight
geography_weight.description: Weight for geography match in fit score

budget_weight.label: Budget Weight
budget_weight.description: Weight for budget indicators in fit score

email_engagement_weight.label: Email Engagement Weight
email_engagement_weight.description: Weight for email engagement in intent score

website_activity_weight.label: Website Activity Weight
website_activity_weight.description: Weight for website visits in intent score

content_consumption_weight.label: Content Consumption Weight
content_consumption_weight.description: Weight for content downloads in intent score

product_interest_weight.label: Product Interest Weight
product_interest_weight.description: Weight for product page views in intent score

mql_threshold.label: MQL Threshold
mql_threshold.description: Score threshold for Marketing Qualified Lead

sql_threshold.label: SQL Threshold
sql_threshold.description: Score threshold for Sales Qualified Lead

hot_lead_threshold.label: Hot Lead Threshold
hot_lead_threshold.description: Score threshold for hot lead classification

warm_lead_threshold.label: Warm Lead Threshold
warm_lead_threshold.description: Score threshold for warm lead classification

include_score_breakdown.label: Include Score Breakdown
include_score_breakdown.description: Include fit and intent score breakdown in output

calculate_lead_grade.label: Calculate Lead Grade
calculate_lead_grade.description: Calculate letter grade (A-F) in addition to score

apply_time_decay.label: Apply Time Decay
apply_time_decay.description: Apply time decay to behavioral signals

time_decay_days.label: Time Decay Days
time_decay_days.description: Number of days for behavioral signals to decay to 50%
